casebody.data:
The GIRDLER CORPORATION v. E. I. DU PONT DE NEMOURS & COMPANY, Appellant. No. 8995. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Jan. 8, 1946. Decided Jan. 15, 1946. Albert T. St. Clair, of Wilmington, Del. (Hugh M. Morris, Alexander L. Nichols, Chester H. Biesterfeld, and A. Newton Huff, all of Wilmington, Del.., on the brief), for appellant. Charles H. Walker, of New York City (James R. Morford and Marvel & Mor-ford, all of Wilmington, Delaware, Clair W. Fairbank and Dean, Fairbank & Hirsch, all of New York City, and Virgil E. Woodcock, of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before GOODRICH, McLAUGHLIN, and O’CONNELL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court, 59 F. Supp. 583, is affirmed.
